NAME
  icebox_colbuf - manage colbuf bits

SYNOPSIS
  icebox-colbuf [options] [input.txt [output.txt]]


OPTIONS
  -c    check colbuf bits
  -f    fix colbuf bits

 


AUTHOR
  This manual page was written by Ruben Undheim <ruben.undheim@gmail.com> for the Debian project (and may be used by others).
